title: Calories in Hush Puppies
meta_description: Learn calories in hush puppies per serving, including carbs, fat, protein, sodium, and easy tweaks for healthier options.
assumptions: Standard deep-fried cornmeal hush puppies (~30 g each), basic recipe with flour, cornmeal, egg, milk, and oil; no dipping sauces.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by recipe, size, frying oil, and brand; homemade or restaurant versions differ. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: Three hush puppies provide ~180 kcal, mostly from carbs and fat.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tbsp chopped onions per hush puppy

faqs.q: How many calories in one hush puppy?
faqs.a: About 60 kcal for a standard 30 g deep-fried hush puppy.

faqs.q: Are hush puppies high in carbs?
faqs.a: Yes, mainly from cornmeal—8 g carbs per hush puppy, with 0.5 g fiber.

faqs.q: What's the fat content in hush puppies?
faqs.a: Around 3 g total fat per hush puppy, including 0.5 g saturated fat from frying oil.

faqs.q: Do hush puppies have much protein?
faqs.a: Low protein—only 1 g per hush puppy, better as a side than a main.

faqs.q: How to reduce calories in hush puppies?
faqs.a: Bake or air-fry instead of deep-frying to cut ~25 kcal per piece.
